value.title: Bidirectional relationships and ambiguity
value.excerpt: Learn how to avoid ambiguity caused by bidirectional relationships in a Tabular model with Power BI or Analysis Services. Article and download: https://sql.bi/75696?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: Comparing with previous selected time period in DAX
value.excerpt: This video describes how you can create a comparison with the previous time period in a visualization, regardless of whether the time periods are consecutive or not: https://sql.bi/526183/?aff=yt (Optimizing duplicated DAX expressions using variables)  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt

value.title: Computing totals by summing visible values in DAX
value.excerpt: This video shows how to compute a measure that sums the values produced row by row in the visual into the visual total, instead of recomputing the total value in the filter context of the total. Article and download: https://sql.bi/89870

value.title: Introducing RANK window function in DAX
value.excerpt: RANK is a new DAX function to rank items based on multiple columns: discover how RANK works and its differences with RANKX.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/801505?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: Using KEEPFILTERS in DAX
value.excerpt: This video explains how to use KEEPFILTERS to intersect instead of overriding an existing filter context in DAX. Using FEEPFILTERS simplifies the code and improves performance. Article and download: https://sql.bi/751682?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive

value.title: When to use KEEPFILTERS over iterators
value.excerpt: How to use KEEPFILTERS in DAX iterator functions to preserve arbitrarily shaped filters in context transition.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/705054?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: Govern data across an enterprise
value.excerpt: Govern data across an enterprise

topItems.title: Discover trusted data using Microsoft Purview
Manage Power BI assets by using Microsoft Purview
topItems.excerpt: Improve data governance and asset discovery using Power BI and Microsoft Purview integration.

value.title: Introduction to data analytics on Azure
value.excerpt: Introduction to data analytics on Azure

topItems.title: Explore Azure data services for modern analytics
topItems.excerpt: Understand analytics solutions in the Azure data ecosystem. Explore the architecture of a scalable analytics solution to meet business needs.

topItems.title: Understand concepts of data analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore key concepts of data analytics, including types of analytics, data, and storage. Explore the analytics process and tools used to discover insights.

topItems.title: Explore data analytics at scale
topItems.excerpt: Describe data analytics at scale and understand the roles of a data team. Learn about the responsibilities of an enterprise data analyst and what tools are available to build scalable solutions.

value.title: Add calculated tables and columns to Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll be able to add calculated tables and calculated columns to your data model. You'll also be able to describe row context, which is used to evaluated calculated column formulas. Because it's possible to add columns to a table by using Power Query, you'll also learn when it's best to create calculated columns instead of Power Query custom columns.

value.title: Use DAX time intelligence functions in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll learn the meaning of time intelligence and how to add time intelligence DAX calculations to your model. These calculations will include year-to-date (YTD), year-over-year (YoY) growth, and others.

value.title: Discover trusted data using Microsoft Purview
value.excerpt: purview, enterprise data analyst

value.title: Explore data analytics at scale
value.excerpt: Describe data analytics at scale and understand the roles of a data team. Learn about the responsibilities of an enterprise data analyst and what tools are available to build scalable solutions.

value.title: Ingest Data with Dataflows Gen2 in Microsoft Fabric
value.excerpt: Data ingestion is crucial in analytics. Microsoft Fabric's Data Factory offers Dataflows (Gen2) for visually creating multi-step data ingestion and transformation using Power Query Online.
